means: 成熟的；盛开的；张满的（等于full-blown）

PerfectNetExp.abs: fullblooded 纯种的, fullblown 全开的, fullbloom 盛花

entry.tran: 具有一应特征的;完全成熟的;彻头彻尾的
entry.def: Full-blown means having all the characteristics of a particular type of thing or person.

example.ex: Before becoming a full-blown director, he worked as the film editor on Citizen Kane.
example.tran: 在成为一名完全成熟的导演之前，他曾经是电影《公民凯恩》的剪辑师。
